concise_definition: n. (专有名词) 安吉（女性名，Angela 的昵称）

definitions.explanation_en: A feminine given name, commonly used as a diminutive or informal form of Angela. It is often associated with warmth, friendliness, and personal familiarity.
definitions.explanation_cn: 女性名，通常是 Angela 的昵称或非正式形式，常带有亲切、友好和私人化的情感色彩。
definitions.example_en: Angie called me to check if I was okay after the storm.
definitions.example_cn: 风暴过后，安吉打电话来问我是否安好。
